com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Profile
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View the user's profile page including their posts, followers, and following details.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Edit Profile
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open the edit profile screen to update profile information, including bio and name.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Follow/Unfollow User
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Follow or unfollow the user by interacting with the 'Follow' button.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Posts
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View the user's posts, organized in grid or reel formats.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Story Highlights
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View the user's story highlights through the highlights carousel.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Send Message
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Send a direct message to the user by clicking on the message icon.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Followers/Following
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View the list of the user's followers or the people they are following.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Like, Comment, Save, Share Post
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Engage with posts by liking, commenting, saving to collections, or sharing.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Scroll Feed
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Scroll through the user's post feed to view their latest content.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Change Avatar
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Change the user's profile avatar by uploading a new picture.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Notifications
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View notifications for activities like new followers, comments, or likes.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Settings
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access the app's settings menu to adjust preferences and privacy settings.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Switch Accounts
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Switch between different Instagram accounts using the account switcher button.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Refresh Feed
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Refresh the profile feed to load new content.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Explore Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Explore recommended or trending content based on user interests.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Suggested Account
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View and follow suggested users based on mutual connections or common interests.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Dismiss Suggested User
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Dismiss a suggested user from the suggestions carousel.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Settings and Activity
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access settings and view activity related details on Instagram.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Orders and Payments
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open the section to review and manage your orders and payments within Instagram.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Help
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open the Help Center to find assistance or information on using Instagram.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Privacy Center
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access the Privacy Center to manage your privacy settings and review options for protecting your data.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Account Status
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Check your account status and any related issues within settings.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: About
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View information about Instagram, including policies, terms, and other relevant details.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Add Account
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap to add a new Instagram account to the app.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Log Out
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Log out from the current Instagram account.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Log Out All Accounts
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Log out from all Instagram accounts currently logged in on the app.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Create
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Start creating a new post, story, reel, or other content types on Instagram.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Reels
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access the Reels section to view short video content shared by users on Instagram.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Record Video
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Press the button to start capturing a video.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Stop Video Recording
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Stop the video recording by pressing the stop button.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Navigate to Edit Screen
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Click the 'Edit' button (id: 16) to go to video editing options.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Add Audio
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the 'Add Audio' button (id: 22) to add background music or sounds to your video.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Add Text
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the 'Add Text' button (id: 23) to overlay text onto the video.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Add Sticker
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the 'Add Sticker' button (id: 24) to insert a sticker or graphic into the video.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Apply Effects
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the 'Effects' button (id: 25) to apply visual effects to the video.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Add Voiceover
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the 'Voiceover' button (id: 26) to record and add a voiceover to the video.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Add Additional Clips
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the 'Add Clips' button (id: 27) to insert additional video clips.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Enable Captions
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the 'Captions' button (id: 28) to add automated captions or subtitles to the video.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Save Video
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the 'Save' button (id: 29) to save your edited video to your gallery.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Cancel Edits
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Press the 'Cancel' button (id: 31) to discard any changes and return to the previous screen.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Navigate to Video Preview
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Watch the recorded video preview in the post-capture preview area.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Apply Template
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Use the template browser (id: 45) to apply predefined templates to the video.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Preview Video
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the preview button in the post-capture preview container (id: 39) to view your video before sharing.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Open Camera Settings
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open the camera tool menu (id: 52) to adjust settings like flash or resolution.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Capture Still Image
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Press the 'Capture' button (within id: 5) to take a snapshot during the video recording.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Toggle Camera Modes
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Use the mode toggle button in the pre-capture control container (id: 43) to switch between camera modes.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Enable AR Effects
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the AR effects button (id: 25) to open augmented reality effects and filters.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Adjust Clip Length
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Trim or adjust the video length by interacting with the preview container (id: 39).

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Quick Capture
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Initiate a quick capture session from the quick capture fragment/container.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Shutter Button
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Capture a photo or video using the shutter button.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Toggle Flash
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Turn the flash on or off using the flash button.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Switch Camera
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Switch between the front and back camera using the switch camera button.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Access Gallery
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open the gallery to view previously taken or existing images and videos.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Story Settings
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open story settings using the settings gear icon.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Expand Tools Menu
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Expand the tools menu to access additional camera functionalities.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Interactive Content Pre-Capture
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Engage with interactive content options before capturing media.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Navigate Using Swipe
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Navigate through the app interface using swipe actions within the navigation container.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Access Camera Tool Menu
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access various camera tools using the tool menu container.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Select a Media
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Select a specific post, reel, or photo displayed in the profile media section like a reel by 'huhuli' or a photo.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Leave a New Note
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Leave a new note for followers you follow back, sharing a message or update.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Delete Note
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Delete an existing note shared with the followers.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Template Browser
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Browse through available templates for creating content on Instagram.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Gallery Access
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open the gallery to view, select or upload photos or videos from the device to Instagram.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Switch Album
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Use the album switcher to change between different albums in the gallery, such as Recents.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Fast Scroll Gallery
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Use the fast scroll feature to quickly navigate through the gallery images.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Share
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Share your media via various means by pressing the 'Share to' button, opening up sharing options beyond stories.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Create Mode
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Enter Create Mode, which offers a more creative layout and tools for generating unique content.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Boomerang
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access Boomerang, a feature that creates a looping video effect, by selecting the Boomerang button.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Layout
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Select the Layout button to create collages or multi-photo layouts for your media posts.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Post Capture Controls
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Use post-capture controls to edit and manage your captured photos or videos before sharing.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Play/Pause Reel
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Double tap to play or pause the reel currently being viewed.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Like and View Likes
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Like posts, reels, or stories, and view the list of users who liked the content.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Comment on Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Add a comment to posts, reels, or stories, or view existing comments.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Share Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Share posts, reels, or stories with others using various sharing options.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Save Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Save posts, reels, or stories to your account for later access.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Emoji Reaction and View Reactions
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: React to content or comments using emojis and view who reacted.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Zoom Media
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Pinch to zoom in or out of an image or video in the feed.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: See More Options
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access additional options like reporting, copying links, and more for posts, reels, or stories.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Remix Reel
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Create a new reel using elements from the currently viewed reel.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Create and Edit Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Organize multiple video clips into sequences, or create new posts, stories, or reels.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Check Post Insights
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View engagement metrics like reach, impressions, and interactions for posts or reels.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Manage Comments and Tagging
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Set rules for comments, tagging, and mentions on your content.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Control Sharing and Reuse
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Manage how others can share or reuse your content.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View and Manage User Profiles
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap on a user’s profile image or name to visit their profile, follow, or unfollow them.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Block or Unblock Users
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Block users to restrict interaction or unblock them to allow interaction again.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Manage Restrictions and Hidden Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Restrict accounts or manage settings to hide your story and live videos from specific users.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Account Privacy Settings
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Adjust privacy settings for your account, including visibility and interaction controls.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Manage Notifications and Limits
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Adjust notification settings, limit interactions, mute notifications, and manage time usage.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Saved and Archived Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access saved posts and archived stories or media from your account.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Change Privacy Settings
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Adjust privacy settings for posts, stories, and interactions.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Activity Log
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Review recent activities, including posts, likes, comments, and interactions.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Like
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the heart icon to like a post or reel.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Comment
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open and post comments on a post or reel.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Save Post
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Tap the save icon to add posts or reels to your saved collection.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Reshare Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Share posts or reels with others using the reshare button.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Post Details
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Open a post to view likes, comments, and sharing options.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Story Interaction
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: View or interact with stories by tapping on avatars.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Story Seen State
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Check if a story has already been viewed.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Create Reel
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Start creating a reel with tools for audio, video trimming, and effects.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Play/Pause Reel
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Double tap to play or pause reels.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Play Audio
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Play or manage audio associated with reels.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Zoom Media
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Pinch or spread fingers to zoom in or out on images and videos.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Swipe Navigation
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Swipe left or right to navigate posts, stories, or carousels.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Search and Explore
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Search for content, accounts, or tags using the search tab.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Home Feed
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Navigate to the home screen to view posts and reels.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Open Camera
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access the camera to capture or post new content.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Camera Controls
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Use camera tools like flash, filters, or switching between front and back cameras.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Post Options
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access post actions, such as sharing, saving, reporting, or tagging users.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Carousel
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Swipe through multiple media items in carousel posts.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Overlay Interactions
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Display and interact with stickers, pop-ups, or interactive overlays.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Cancel Operation
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Cancel the current action and return to the previous screen.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Comments
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Expand and view all comments on a post.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Open Menu
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access app-wide navigation using the menu icon.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: View Saved Content
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Navigate to your collection of saved posts and reels.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Interact with Photos
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Select and preview images shared in grid or feed format.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: New Post
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Start creating a new post by selecting or capturing media.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Photo
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Capture or select a photo from the gallery to post.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Story
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Share selected media as a story visible for 24 hours.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Reel
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Create or explore short video content, including length and speed adjustments.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Live
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Broadcast live video to followers in real time or schedule a live stream.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Gallery Navigation
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access and navigate photos and videos available in the device gallery.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Camera Controls
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Pre-capture controls, including flash toggle, camera switch, timer, and hands-free recording.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: AR Effects & Filters
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Add AR effects, filters, or creative tools to enhance captured media.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Post Options
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Choose where to share captured media: Post, Story, Reel, or Live.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Edit Tools
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Access tools to edit media, including layout, alignment, scaling, effects, and clip trimming.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Gallery Preview
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Quickly preview and select recently captured or saved media.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Navigate Tabs
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Switch between main sections like Feed, Search, Reels, Creation, or Profile.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Search Bar
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Search for content, accounts, or hashtags.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Add Details
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Add titles, descriptions, or interactive elements like polls, trivia, and 'This or That'.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Drafts
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Save and manage draft content for future posts or edits.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Audience Selection
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Modify or choose the target audience for your posts or live streams.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Shopping
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Enable or explore shopping features for posts and stories.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Action Bar
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: The navigation bar containing buttons and the title of the current screen.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Content Area
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: The main area where media content, posts, or stories are displayed.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Green Screen
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Apply green screen effects to videos or photos.

com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.name: Hands-Free Mode
com.instagram.mainactivity.InstagramMain.description: Record videos without holding down the shutter button.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Log In
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Sign in to your account by clicking the 'Log in' button.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Log Into Another Account
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Sign in using a different Instagram account by clicking the 'Log into another account' button.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Create New Account
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Register a new Instagram account by clicking the 'Create new account' button.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Edit Cover
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Click on the 'Edit cover' option to make adjustments to the new reel cover photo.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Write Caption
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Click on the caption input area to write a caption and add hashtags.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Add Hashtags
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Use the hashtags suggestion option to add relevant hashtags to your post.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Create Poll
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Use the poll suggestion option to create and add a poll to your post.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Tag People
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Select the 'Tag people' option to tag users in your post.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Add Location
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Click on the 'Add location' option to include a location with the post.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Choose Audience
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Select 'Audience' to decide who can see the post, e.g., everyone.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Set Profile Display
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Choose profile display settings to determine where this post will appear, such as the Main grid and Reels grid.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Rename Audio
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Select 'Rename audio' to change the name of the audio associated with the post.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Save Draft
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Click on the 'Save draft' button to save your current progress on the post as a draft for later editing or sharing.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Share Post
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Press the 'Share' button to publish the post to your profile immediately.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Edit Highlight Cover
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Tap the 'Edit cover' link to change the cover image for a highlight.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Edit Highlight Title
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Tap the 'highlight_title' button to modify the title of a highlight.

com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.name: Select Media
com.instagram.modal.ModalActivity.description: Tap on media images to select or deselect them using the 'selected_item_overlay' and 'media_toggle' buttons.

com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.name: Browse stories
com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.description: Navigate through different pictures of your story using the browse button.

com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.name: Create Story Highlight
com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.description: Access the option to create a story highlight from a reel.

com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.name: Send Story
com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.description: Send the current story to another user through a reshare button.

com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.name: More Options
com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.description: Open additional settings and options related to the reel viewer with the more options button.

com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.name: Share the picture of Story
com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.description: Send the current story to another user through a reshare button.

com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.name: Copy link
com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.description: Copy the link of the story.

com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.name: Show QR code
com.instagram.modal.TransparentModalActi.description: Show the QR code of the story.

ui0.name: Log Out Prompt
ui0.description: The user is presented with a prompt asking if they are sure they want to log out of their account.

ui0.name: Log Out Confirmation
ui0.description: The user can confirm their decision to log out by clicking the 'Log out' button.

ui0.name: Cancel Log Out
ui0.description: The user can cancel the log-out operation by clicking the 'Cancel' button.

ui0.name: Open Dialog
ui0.description: The dialog containing the log-out confirmation and cancel options is displayed on the screen.

ui0.name: Scroll Through Content
ui0.description: The user can scroll through the content in the scrollable area (identified by the 'scroll_view' div).

ui0.name: Interact with Sticky Footer
ui0.description: The user can interact with elements in the sticky footer at the bottom of the screen, which might contain navigation options or other actionable buttons.

ui0.name: Close Dialog
ui0.description: The user can close the dialog without taking any action, usually by pressing the 'Cancel' button or tapping outside the dialog.

ui0.name: Confirm Action
ui0.description: The user can click the primary action button (Log out) to confirm their action.
